thread.title: 20 Years of Financial Data Is Now Available at GuruFocus
thread.title_full: 20 Years of Financial Data Is Now Available at GuruFocus

title: 20 Years of Financial Data Is Now Available at GuruFocus
text:
20 Years of Financial Data Is Now Available at GuruFocus By GuruFocus.com 28 minutes ago ÓÅ± 
This is the summary of the data and functions in the new page of 20-year financial data. You can see an example here . 
Data Covered (Up to 20 years): Per share data Valuation Ratios Valuation & Quality 
Of course every row of data is clickable. An annual chart and a quarterly chart will be displayed once the data is clicked. A trend line on the annual data displays the growth rate of the underlying data. For common size ratios such as ROE, ROA, profit margins, an industry median data is also displayed in the annual data chart to show the performance of the company compare with the industry. For instance, the chart below shows the Operating Margin of WalMart (WMT). Currently WMT has an operating margin of 5.6%, while the Retail industry has a median operating margin of 3.3%. Historically WMT always has a higher operating margin (green line) then the industry median (blue line): 
Excel download 
Premium Members can download the 15-year and 60-quarter in Excel by clicking on the Excel icon above the financial data table. It can also be in CSV format. 
Currencies 
The financial data is also in the same currency of the stocks displayed in the page. If the data was converted into this currency from its original currency, an exchange rate is displayed at the bottom of the data table. The page lists the other countries that the stock is also traded in. Clicking on those will display the financial data in the currencies of those countries. 
Excel Add-in 
The data is also available in GuruFocus Excel Add-in , which allows subscribers to do fully customized research. This is for PremiumPlus members only. 
Access area 
GuruFocus Premium Members has the full access to the 15-year financial data for the regions they subscribe, the Excel download, and the charts. If you are not a Premium Member, we invite you for a 7-day free trial. This article first appeared on GuruFocus .
